predict.build_pred_frame(genre_code, year, runtime, popularity, rating, budget)¶

Creates data frame based on user input on movies homepage.

Args:
genre_code (str): code of the movie genre selected by the user. Code for a movie genre is extracted by a dictionary which maps a movie genre to its corresponding code. year (int): release year entered by the user. runtime (int): runtime of movie entered by the user. popularity (int): popularity of movie entered by the user. rating (int): rating of movie entered by the user. budget (int): budget of movie entered by the user.
Returns:
Dataframe used to make movie revenue prediction. Serves as input parameter in movie_pred(user_frame) function.
predict.movie_pred(user_frame)¶

Generates predicted revenue based on movie metadata.

Args:
user_frame: dataframe containing movie attributes.
Returns:
Predicted movie revenue value. Value is displayed on the results page of application.
